name: Assignment4 Add Sound To Your Game
body:
### Add sound to your game  
Create a sound manager as showed in class and add sound to your game.

**You should at least:**    
Have one background music.  
Have FOUR clips of sound effects.  
Play at the correct time point.    


###Other resources you may also want to refer to:
http://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/PartSysWhatIs.html  

You may try to use Particle Systems to make the visual effects.
You can do this by instantiate prefabs of particle system at the position where *something happens.*      

Be creative, and have fun with making your game more *JUICY*!  

**Note:**     
There is no due date for this assignment. However, our evaluation of your programming skill depends on what we find on RANDON in 2 or 3 days.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
